ygData.subject: Re: Batlles at both ends...
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois heard Soundwave s transmission. He was almost done the embassy, so this could be handled right now. Vulois contacted Soundwave. Okay, that s it.

Vulois heard Soundwave's transmission. He was almost done the 
embassy, so this could be handled right now. Vulois contacted 
Soundwave.

"Okay, that's it. Enough. If there is any more fighting then there 
may be no hope for our mission. Soundwave, try and talk Zardus into a 
peaceful settlement, a truce if you will. If that doesn't work, then 
just tell him you are on a peace mission, and will not fight any 
more. Hide behind something and only fire at if you are fired upon. 
Vulois out."

He went back to work on the embassy.
